summary: No new characters or connections in this chapter.
summary_short: Rodion Raskolnikov is the most connected figure (23 ties).
highlights: Most central: Rodion Raskolnikov (23), Dmitri Prokofich Razumihin (16), Sonia Marmeladov (15), Katerina Ivanovna (14)
story_summary: Porfiry Petrovitch visits Raskolnikov, discussing his health and their previous encounters. He expresses a desire for openness and reflects on the misunderstandings that have arisen between them. Porfiry admits to having suspected Raskolnikov and explains how various incidents led him to that conclusion, while Raskolnikov feels increasingly uneasy about Porfiry's intentions and his own guilt.
